properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:20PM AKST until January 13 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Travel will be very
difficult. Additional snow accumulations of 4 inches are
expected. Visibility will be less than one half mile at times.

* WHERE...Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys.

* WHEN...9 PM today to 6 PM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause
areas of blowing and drifting snow. Significant drifting of the
snow is likely. Snow developing late this evening will cause
low visibility to develop. The worst conditions are expected
from late tonight through Monday afternoon.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM AKST MONDAY
